[[inst_acrc]]
==== ACRC

*Syntax:* acrc rst_type

*Description:* Access Control Ring Call: initiates a system call by entering the kernel.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_acrc.svg[ACRC encoding,width=800]

*Group:* SYS/SYS
